description:
Scotty’s favorite glue gun (affiliated link): http://amzn.to/2gYKRhV

Elmer's Glue-All Multi-Purpose Liquid Glue (affiliated link): http://amzn.to/2gAQi9P

Flexible modelling Paste (affiliated link): http://amzn.to/2knUPdz

Learn to make frozen pool models for all your miniature 28mm tabletop games such as Dungeons and Dragons and Pathfinder. This easy craft will save you valuable time, so you have more hours to play the games you love. The materials to craft the frozen pool are also cheap and easy to obtain so this project won’t break your budget. Bring a few crafting supplies and sit down with DM Scotty to begin your DIY crafting adventure. You can find the tools you need at my website ( http://www.thedmscraft.com/ ). So grab your gluegun and Go Forth and Craft.

Become a friend to the Craft and help me bring more content to the community by joining Patreon. You will receive weekly exclusive DM Scotty content. https://www.patreon.com/theDMsCraft?ty=h

Join The Tabletop Crafters Guild Facebook group for more crafts and camaraderie. 
https://www.facebook.com/groups/dmscottyscraftsngames/

Twitter: @TheDMsCraft
title: Frozen Over Pools Scatter Terrain (DM's Craft #184)
